en: Deepening national defense and military reform

description.zh-cn: 自2015年起由中共中央总书记习近平领导推行的、对中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队进行的全面改革。
description.en: A comprehensive reform of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Armed Police Force led by CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping since 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会
en: 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次重要会议，习近平在此次会议后成为最高领导人。
description.en: An important congress of the Communist Party of China, after which Xi Jinping became the paramount leader.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第三次全体会议
en: Third Plenary Session of the 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 提出深化军队体制编制调整改革，并将军队改革纳入全面深化改革的总体布局。
description.en: Proposed to deepen the reform of the military system and structure, and incorporated military reform into the overall layout of comprehensively deepening reforms.

nodes.id: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组

zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组
en: CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform

description.zh-cn: 为领导深化国防和军队改革而成立的专门机构，由习近平亲自担任组长。
description.en: A special body established to lead the deepening of national defense and military reform, personally headed by Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Senior general of the People's Liberation Army, former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 关于深化国防和军队改革的意见

zh-cn: 关于深化国防和军队改革的意见
en: Opinions on Deepening the Reform of National Defense and the Military

description.zh-cn: 由中央军委印发的文件，标志着军队改革的正式启动。
description.en: A document issued by the Central Military Commission, marking the official launch of the military reform.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾划分的战区级别组织，在2016年的改革中被五大战区取代。
description.en: Theater-level organizations of the People's Liberation Army, which were replaced by five Theater Commands in the 2016 reform.

en: Theater command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 2016年军改后设立的中国人民解放军战区级别联合作战指挥机构，取代了原有的七大军区。
description.en: Theater-level joint operations command structures of the PLA established after the 2016 military reform, replacing the original seven military regions.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上作战部队。在2015年军改中成立了独立的领导机构。
description.en: The land-based service branch of the People's Liberation Army. An independent leading organ was established for it during the 2015 military reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军火箭军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 由原第二炮兵部队改组成立的中国人民解放军第四个独立军种。
description.en: The fourth independent service branch of the PLA, reorganized from the former Second Artillery Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 在2015年军改中新成立的中国人民解放军军种。
description.en: A new service branch of the PLA established during the 2015 military reform.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事机关。
description.en: The highest national military authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家宪兵部队，在本次改革中领导指挥体制和力量结构被调整。
description.en: The national gendarmerie force of the People's Republic of China, whose command structure and composition were adjusted in this reform.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革
en: Deepening reform of Party and state institutions

description.zh-cn: 2018年由中共中央推动的对党和国家机构进行的全面改革，其中包括了对武警部队的改革内容。
description.en: A comprehensive reform of Party and state institutions promoted by the CPC Central Committee in 2018, which included reforms to the People's Armed Police.

description.zh-cn: 原属武警部队序列的部队，在2018年改革中退出现役。
description.en: A force formerly part of the People's Armed Police, which was demilitarized in the 2018 reform.

description.zh-cn: 其领导管理的海警队伍在2018年改革中转隶武警部队。
description.en: The coast guard force under its administration was transferred to the People's Armed Police during the 2018 reform.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在2012年中共十八大后开始筹划并推行深化国防和军队改革。
description.en: After the 18th CPC National Congress in 2012, Xi Jinping began to plan and implement the deepening of national defense and military reform.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 习近平在中共十八大后当选为中共中央总书记和中共中央军委主席，成为中华人民共和国最高领导人，这为他推行军事改革奠定了权力基础。
description.en: After the 18th CPC National Congress, Xi Jinping was elected as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission, becoming the paramount leader of the PRC, which provided the power base for him to implement military reforms.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中共十八届三中全会明确提出了要深化军队体制编制调整改革，并将军队改革纳入全面深化改革的总体布局。
description.en: The Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee explicitly proposed to deepen the reform of the military's system and structure, and incorporated military reform into the overall layout of comprehensively deepening reforms.

relationships.target: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组

description.zh-cn: 为推进军改，中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组于2014年3月成立，由习近平亲自出任组长。
description.en: To advance the military reform, the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform was established in March 2014, with Xi Jinping personally serving as its leader.

position.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组副组长
position.en: Deputy Leader of the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform

description.zh-cn: 在中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组中，许其亮担任副组长，是组长习近平的下属。
description.en: In the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform, Xu Qiliang served as a deputy leader, subordinate to the leader Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组副组长
position.en: Deputy Leader of the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform

description.zh-cn: 在中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组中，范长龙担任副组长，是组长习近平的下属。
description.en: In the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform, Fan Changlong served as a deputy leader, subordinate to the leader Xi Jinping.

relationships.source: 关于深化国防和军队改革的意见

description.zh-cn: 该文件的印发标志着军队改革的正式启动。
description.en: The issuance of this document marked the official launch of the military reform.

description.zh-cn: 改革中成立了陆军领导机构，改变了以往陆军由四总部代为管理的情况，标志着大陆军主义的终结。
description.en: The reform established a leading organ for the Ground Force, changing the previous situation where the army was managed by the four general headquarters, and marking the end of 'army-centrism'.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 作为军事改革的一部分，原第二炮兵部队改组成立为火箭军，成为解放军第四个独立军种。
description.en: As part of the military reform, the former Second Artillery Force was reorganized and established as the Rocket Force, becoming the PLA's fourth independent service branch.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

description.zh-cn: 战略支援部队是在此轮军事改革中新成立的军种。
description.en: The Strategic Support Force is a new service branch established during this round of military reform.

description.zh-cn: 改革撤销了原有的七大军区体制。
description.en: The reform abolished the original system of seven military regions.

description.zh-cn: 改革建立了新的五大战区联合作战指挥机构，以取代原有的七大军区。
description.en: The reform established a new system of five theater command joint operations command structures to replace the original seven military regions.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 根据改革决定，自2018年1月1日起，武警部队由中共中央、中央军委集中统一领导，归中央军委建制。
description.en: According to the reform decision, from January 1, 2018, the People's Armed Police force is under the centralized and unified leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the Central Military Commission, and is placed under the command of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革

description.zh-cn: 根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，原属武警部队序列的公安边防部队全部退出现役。
description.en: According to the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the Public Security Border Troops, formerly part of the People's Armed Police, were all demilitarized.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，国家海洋局领导管理的海警队伍转隶武警部队。
description.en: According to the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the coast guard force administered by the State Oceanic Administration was transferred to the People's Armed Police.
